title: Is pickpocket twitch and evelynn legacy?
body: Are these skins going in the legacy vault?

replies.body: Katey.. Don't know if you're going to read it, but if possible before the Heist end... make "Judge Taric" Please? Some love for Taric, not only recolored skin.. Bring the robber to Court and have them judge by Judge Taric with his hammer :D
They can't just hammer out a skin in 2 days. Common sense should dictate that. :P

> Nope, they're not legacy. :]

i believe the reason people are confused is because of the latest article which implies that they are: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/store-update/heist-ending-soon
The article gives a link with a clear list of which skins will become Legacy, as well as a humorous tidbit explaining how Twitch and Evelynn escaped lockup.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AFrAfqNF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-01T23:38:11.305+0000)
> Nope, they're not legacy. :]

Now, when in the store, and you click "Limited Availability", these skins populate. Is there any reason why? @Riot KateyKhaos

> [{quoted}](name=ManlyGranny,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AFrAfqNF,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2014-12-11T22:51:29.905+0000)
> Now, when in the store, and you click "Limited Availability", these skins populate. Is there any reason why? @Riot KateyKhaos

Ooops! They're definitely not legacy, they were accidentally labeled as so. It'll be correctly shortly. Thanks for the heads up!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AFrAfqNF,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2014-12-12T00:12:39.429+0000)
> Ooops! They're definitely not legacy, they were accidentally labeled as so. It'll be correctly shortly. Thanks for the heads up!

Awesome, thanks a lot for the quick response!

> [{quoted}](name=ManlyGranny,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AFrAfqNF,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2014-12-13T05:48:00.712+0000)
> Awesome, thanks a lot for the quick response!

No worries, thanks for pointing it out!
